Articles.Content: so texture replacer has been working poerfectly fine for the past 4 years, but randomly earlier today the textures stopped working. the skybox isnt working nor are the kerbals skin textures, however when im in the ksc, i can see the mod icon at the bottom and edit the kerbals textures even though they dont work in flight. i have tried reinstalling the mod multiple times and i cant seem to get it to work. can someone please help me?
